CustomField.formula: ROUND(9*( (5*FLOOR((TODAY()-DATE(1996,01,01))/7) + MIN(5, MOD(TODAY()-DATE(1996,01,01), 7) + MIN(1, 24/9*(MOD(NOW()-DATETIMEVALUE('1996-01-01 12:00:00'), 1))) )) - (5*FLOOR((DATEVALUE(Date_and_Time_Submitted__c)-DATE(1996,01,01))/7) + MIN(5, MOD(DATEVALUE(Date_and_Time_Submitted__c)-DATE(1996,01,01), 7) + MIN(1, 24/9*(MOD(Date_and_Time_Submitted__c-DATETIMEVALUE('1996-01-01 12:00:00'), 1))) )) ), 0)
CustomField.label: Business Hours Open
